name.title: The name you want to give your ICS-2000

email.title: The email of your Klik Aan Klik Uit account

password.title: The password of your Klik Aan Klik Uit account

deviceBlacklist.title: A list of device ids you do not want to appear in HomeKit

localBackupAddress.title: The ip address of your ICS-2000 in case it can't be automatically found in the network

deviceConfigOverrides.title: An object used to override the content of DeviceConfigs.ts.

discoverMessage.title: The HEX message you want to use to discover your local ICS-2000. If not provided, the message hardcoded in the code is used
